dimensions: Warp x Weft: 679 x 125 cm (22 ft. 3 5/16 in. x 49 3/16 in.)
title: Manufacturer's color blanket
medium: Technique: plain weave with weft floats using slubbed yarns.
description: Designers 'blanket' with 138 different color combinations created by warp stripes of white, orange, chartreuse, dark green, blue and black (each 8 inches wide) crossed by 23 weft bands (varying from 9 1/2 to 12 1/2 inches in height).
name: Manufacturer's color blanket
